familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.description: Pres. Trump resigned as director and president/treasurer/secretary of Briarcliff Properties, Inc. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and is part of other entity structures. Trump retains an ownership interest.

Former president of Trump Briarcliff Manor Development LLC (F/K/A Briar Hall Development LLC), in which Pres. Trump retains ownership interests. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and provides back office support functions to other entities.
familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.business: Trump Briarcliff Manor Development LLC (F/K/A Briar Hall Development LLC)

conflict: Trump Briarcliff Manor Development (Formerly Briar Hall Development)
